segments.text: I don ’ t know why bucks have such a great charm that a great many people are after nothing else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They want to be filthy with dough and think it the only source of their happiness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But many rich guys don ’ t think they are truly happy . There is always some empty feeling deep inside them .
segments.speaker: S1
